item.description:
Enjoy great food, a unique martini list and a fabulous bartender!  The downstairs lounge is a beautiful, intimate setting.

This seems like a popular event so I thought we could do it monthly.  Third Wednesdays.

As always just us in the room downstairs with an entertaining bartender!!

 

We are inviting a few other groups this month.

 

This event will be going on hiatus for the holidays after this month.
item.how_to_find_us: We have the downstairs bar/lounge just for our group!
item.name: Artichokes! Downstairs bar just for us! Happy Hour! Min. of 15 people required
